title: Practical Lubrication for Industrial Facilities
description:
Practical Lubrication for Industrial Facilities - Heinz P. Bloch (Fairmont, 2000).pdf

ISBN 0-88173-296-6

Retired reliability engineer Bloch assembles a wide array of data and ideas for mechanics, machinists, and lubrications specialists as well as his own colleagues, to help them understand what matters most in a lubricant and distinguish mere sales talk from relevant facts. He discusses such topics as the principles of lubrication; general purpose oils to inhibit rust and oxidation; hydraulic fluids; environmentally friendly, synthetic, and forest-product and paper machine lubricants; lubricating greases; pastes; waxes; tribosystems; oil mist lubrication systems; bearings; and handling and analyzing lubricants. He includes a glossary
